name: ng1-template
description: AngularJS, Typescript and Gulp template for large applications

scripts.postinstall: bower install && typings install && gulp setup
scripts.update-swagger: npm un --save-dev swagen swagen-ng1-http && npm i --save-dev swagen swagen-ng1-http
scripts.update-gulp: npm un --save-dev ng1-template-gulp && npm i --save-dev ng1-template-gulp

author: Angular Template
